damage_formula.description: Giant Slayer deals bonus damage as percentage of target's MAX HP. Lower proc chance than Warmaster (30% vs 60%), but can proc MULTIPLE times per skill (once per hit). Damage can not crit.

proc_mechanics.procs_per_skill: Multiple (can proc on EACH hit of a multi-hit skill)
proc_mechanics.multi_hit_interaction: MAJOR ADVANTAGE: Each hit has independent 30% chance to proc. 4-hit skill has ~76% chance for at least 1 proc, ~30% chance for 2+ procs.
proc_mechanics.glancing_hit_interaction: Glancing hits CANNOT crit, therefore CANNOT proc Giant Slayer
proc_mechanics.notes: Best for 3+ hit champions. For 1-2 hit champions, Warmaster is better.

unm_clan_boss_200m_hp.notes: Against UNM Clan Boss (200M HP), Giant Slayer procs deal 6M damage (3% of 200M) - SAME as Warmaster per proc

expected_damage_4_hit_skill_100_crit.description: 4-hit skill at 100% C.RATE: Expected 1.2 procs per skill (4 × 0.30), averaging 7.2M damage
expected_damage_4_hit_skill_100_crit.notes: This is ~2× Warmaster damage (3.6M) for same skill use. Giant Slayer clear winner for multi-hit skills.

expected_damage_6_hit_skill_100_crit.description: 6-hit skill at 100% C.RATE: Expected 1.8 procs per skill (6 × 0.30), averaging 10.8M damage
expected_damage_6_hit_skill_100_crit.notes: Massive damage for champions like Septimus A2 (6 hits) or Foli A3 (6 hits). 3× Warmaster damage.

actual_damage_per_turn_with_variance.description: With weak affinity (30% glancing), 4-hit skill averages 2.8 effective hits (4 × 70%), 0.84 procs, 5.04M damage
actual_damage_per_turn_with_variance.notes: Affinity CRITICAL for Giant Slayer damage. Weak affinity = -30% effective hits = -30% Giant Slayer procs.

coldheart_a3.notes: Coldheart A3 with 100% C.RATE averages 7.2M per use (1.2 procs × 6M), contributing ~72M from Giant Slayer over 10 uses (50-turn fight, 4-turn CD)

royal_guard_a3.notes: Royal Guard A3 identical to Coldheart A3 (both 4-hit skills). ~72M Giant Slayer damage over 50 turns.

brogni_passive_reflection.skill: Passive (Blessed Reflection - 1 hit per ally attacked)
brogni_passive_reflection.notes: CRITICAL FINDING: Brogni passive reflection triggers Giant Slayer 1.5× per boss AOE (5 hits × 30% = 1.5 procs), contributing ~9M per AOE. Over 50 turns (40 AOEs), this is ~360M damage from Giant Slayer passive reflection alone. This is Brogni's PRIMARY damage source, NOT his base skills.

heart_of_glory.effect: +5% damage when attacking with full health
heart_of_glory.synergy: Boosts Giant Slayer damage by 5% when at full HP
heart_of_glory.notes: Common pairing for Arena or Lifesteal Set users

single_out.effect: +8% damage to targets with less than 40% HP
single_out.synergy: Boosts Giant Slayer damage by 8% when boss below 40% HP (last ~20 turns of UNM fight)

life_drinker.effect: Heals by 5% of damage inflicted when attacking with 50% HP or less
life_drinker.synergy: Giant Slayer procs (multiple per skill) heal for 300k HP each when below 50% HP
life_drinker.notes: Higher heal potential than Warmaster (multiple procs per skill vs single proc)

vs_warmaster.calculation_formula: Warmaster EV = 0.60 × 6M = 3.6M. Giant Slayer EV = hits × 0.30 × 6M. Breakpoint: hits × 0.30 × 6M > 3.6M → hits > 2.

examples.1_hit_champion: Warmaster: 3.6M avg. Giant Slayer: 1.8M avg. Warmaster wins.
examples.2_hit_champion: Warmaster: 3.6M avg. Giant Slayer: 3.48M avg (1 - (0.7)² = 0.51 chance × 6M). Warmaster slightly better.
examples.3_hit_champion: Warmaster: 3.6M avg. Giant Slayer: 5.67M avg (1 - (0.7)³ = 0.657 chance × 6M + 0.189 × 2 procs). Giant Slayer wins.
examples.4_hit_champion: Warmaster: 3.6M avg. Giant Slayer: 7.2M avg (1.2 procs × 6M). Giant Slayer dominates.
examples.6_hit_champion: Warmaster: 3.6M avg. Giant Slayer: 10.8M avg (1.8 procs × 6M). Giant Slayer overwhelming.

multi_hit_proc_distribution.description: For multi-hit skills, Giant Slayer can proc MULTIPLE times. Probability distribution follows binomial distribution.

4_hit_skill_distribution.notes: 41% chance for exactly 1 proc, 26% chance for 2+ procs, 24% chance for 0 procs

6_hit_skill_distribution.notes: 88% chance for 1+ procs, 51% chance for 2+ procs, 26% chance for 3+ procs

fire_knight_interaction.description: Giant Slayer damage does NOT count as hit for Fire Knight shield reduction. Multi-hit champions STILL better for Fire Knight due to base skill hits, not Giant Slayer procs.
fire_knight_interaction.notes: Fire Knight requires actual hits to reduce shield, not bonus damage from masteries

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with in-game testing (Brogni passive reflection damage), community calculators, binomial probability calculations
metadata.notes: Comprehensive Giant Slayer mechanics for damage attribution modeling and mastery selection. CRITICAL FINDING: Brogni passive reflection is primary damage source (~360M over 50 turns from Giant Slayer procs).
